name: My Dear Globalist Agenda
description:
Welcome to the game "My Dear Globalist Agenda".

It is my fifth full title, this time about a miserable stock broker and an unemployed musician who while desperately trying to swim out of debt find unlikely answers in the local Ku Klux Klan branch, leading them on an absurd and often comedic adventure.

Inside this folder is everything you'll need to play the adventure game and help with the game design process. 
To launch the actual game simply open the appropriate folder and run the .exe or application file 'YAMAIAY'.

[CONTROLS]
The game is played entirely with the mouse. Left click operates, uses, picks things up, and walks, while right click examines things.
At the top of the screen in game is an inventory menu, as well as a menu with saving, loading, and a volume slider. 
All dialogue is passed with a mouse click or any key pressed.
At various points you will have an item that upon examining (right click) will allow you to switch characters at will. This can be important.

[FEEDBACK]
If you're feeling like a constructive human being, inside is a .doc file which can be filled out and emailed back to me for feedback. 

This is very helpful for me to continue making games. 

Thank you for participating,

-Fransis <3
